description: The id of the purchase order (should tie to IP)
name: po_id

description: The style + color + size level of product id
name: sku_id

description: The highest level type of event (ex: initial receipt, shipped, etc.)
name: event_type

description: The next level down type of event (ex: carton_receipt)
name: event_subtype

description: Location id within the distribution center
name: location_id

description: Location description within the distribution center
name: location_desc
